ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We acknowledge contributions by the following members of the lung transplant program and cell therapy laboratory at Mayo Clinic in Jacksonville, Florida: David Erasmus, M.D., Francisco Alvarez, M.D., Jorge Mallea, Kelley Hurst, A.R.N.P., M.D., Heidy David‚ÄêRobinson, A.R.N.P., Dana Kontras, R.N., Athena L. Russell, Rebecca Lefavor, and Cheryl Desmond.

This research was supported by grants from the Center for Regenerative Medicine, Mayo Clinic; the Jorge and Leslie Bacardi Fund for Regenerative Research; an unrestricted grant by United Therapeutics; the Mayo Clinic Brewer Family Career Development Award in Support of Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis and Related Interstitial Lung Disease Research; and PACT (Production Assistance for Cellular Therapy) from National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute. The funding agencies had no role in the study design; in the collection, analysis, and interpretation of data; in the writing of the report; or in the decision to submit the article for publication.
